summary: Miraak the dragonborn now is your follower(require dragonborn)
descriptionHtml:
Note :This is my first ever mod so dont expect it to be perfect and im VIetnamese,my english may not be 100% correct
Title Says it, this mod adds Miraak as a companion this is a beta so here are a few disadvantage
_He uses a male even-toned voice and its pretty weird for an acient nord like him
_He might say the words of power during fight but does not shout 
_He can shout repeatedly(really anoying when he uses urelenting force
_He uses dragon urelenting force instead of the normal
_He can still be your follower even if you didnt finish the quest line(Can somebody fix this for me, just load my file in creation kit and fix it i will give you credits and kudos for this)
You can find him in High Hrothgar
REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC (duh)
Patch 1.1(thanks to the user RyyZan who has been giving me ideas for the new patch)
_Miraak now has the dark elf voice
_Several adjustment to his stats(improve his mage skill ,magika and stamina
_Gives him the Miraak\'s sword
author: vy812002
